mapper.insert: insert into db_ebay_expresspublished (SEQUENCEID, SHOPPINGSERVICEID, OPER, SHOPPINGTIMEMIN, OPENFLAG, EXPRESSTYPE, OPERTIME, SITE, SHOPPINGTIMEMAX, SHOPPINGSERVICE, INTERNATIONALSERVICE, WEIGHTREQUIRED) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shoppingserviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingtimemin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingtimemax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{internationalservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weightrequired,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
